snippet: Éric Woerth, a former aide to President Nicolas Sarkozy will be formally investigated on suspicion of influence peddling and concealing illegal political financing, a French court said.
abstract: Eric Woerth, a former aide to President Nicolas Sarkozy, will be formally investigated on suspicion of influence peddling and concealing illegal political financing; charges relate to accusations that he had taken illegal contributions for Sarkozy's 2007 presidential campaign from the L’Oreal heiress Liliane Bettencourt.
lead_paragraph: Éric Woerth, a former aide to President Nicolas Sarkozy will be formally investigated on suspicion of influence peddling and concealing illegal political financing, a French court said.

headline.main: France: Former Sarkozy Aide Faces Investigation in Bettencourt Affair
headline.print_headline: France: Former Sarkozy Aide Faces Investigation in Bettencourt Affair
